content: **crocheted hat in drops alpaca bouclé drops brushed alpaca silk and drops alpaca the piece is worked top down ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ab-161 yarn group c + c + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - m/l fits head-size 54/56 - 56/58 cm **yarn** drops alpaca bouclé from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-100 g colour 5110 light grey and use drops brushed alpaca silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50-50 g colour 01 off white and use drops alpaca from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-50 g colour 9020 light pearl grey **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 6 mm **crochet gauge** 12 double crochets in width and 13 row in height with 1 strand of each quality 3 strands on hook size 6 mm = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
